sentences.sContent: Juveniledevelopment of intertidal creatures varies nearly as much as their physicalforms.
sentences.sContent_eng: Juveniledevelopment of intertidal creatures varies nearly as much as their physicalforms.
sentences.sCn: 潮间带生物的幼体发育几乎随它们的外形变化而变化。

sentences.sContent: At 235 feet tall, the rock formation is the third tallest intertidal structure in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: At 235 feet tall, the rock formation is the third tallest intertidal structure in the world.
sentences.sCn: 凭借着235英尺的高度，这座岩层成了世界第三高的潮间带结构。

phrases.pCn: 潮间带；潮间地区；潮间区域

words.tran: 安排于隔层之间；放在层间
